content:
1. Belly dance (also known as raqs sharqi)
2. Dabke (a line dance performed at weddings and other social gatherings)
3. Debke ala shamiye (a variation of dabke found in Damascus)
4. Khaleeji (a dance style originating from the Arabian Gulf region)
5. Saidi (a dance style originating in Upper Egypt)
6. Shamadan (a dance performed with a candelabra on the head)
7. Zar (a trance dance originating in Northern Africa and the Middle East)
